item.title: YOW! 2015 Highlights
item.description: Some highlights and a short summary from my attendance at YOW! 2015. All the presentations are online at the YOW! Australia YouTube channel. Note that the section headings are linked to the corresponding presentation video. I attended the Melbourne conference, but some of the videos are from Sydney or Brisbane events. Don Reinertsen - Thriving in a Stochastic World # Keynote Day 1 Why deliver the plan? # Don’t focus on the plan - the plan has no intrinsic business value.
